summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4438 for the improvement of Phinney Avenue from North 50th Street to North 67th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of a street lighting system, widening roadway, paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52382, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
